title: Create multilanguage documentation
content:
With sharpDox it is possible to create multilanguage documentation. For articles you are allowed to use any name. For navigations, namespace descriptions and project descriptions it is necessary to add a new file with a language prefix. Here are some examples:

Namespace-Description

Original: SharpDox.Sdk.sdnd 
Translated: de.SharpDox.Sdk.sdnd

Project-Description

Original: default.sdpd 
Übersetzt: de.sdpd

Navigation

Original: default.sdnav 
Übersetzt: de.sdnav

Because Visual Studio doesn't support multilanguage documentation it was necessary to extend them a bit. Here is a example to create multilanguage inline documentation for sharpDox:

Code-Documentation

Original: 
<summary>SUMMARY</summary> 
<remarks>REMARKS</remarks> 
[...] 
 
Translated: 
<default> 
    <summary>SUMMARY</summary> 
    <remarks>REMARKS</remarks> 
    [...] 
</default> 
<de> 
    <summary>DE_SUMMARY</summary> 
    <remarks>DE_REMARKS</remarks> 
    [...] 
</de>
